num_tested_probands: The probands of the three unrelated families were referred to DCRU because of prolonged duration of action of succinylcholine at a time, when it was not possible to perform genotyping.
No probands were tested in these reports.
num_positive_het_probands: Only one relative of proband 2 was mentioned as being heterozygous for BCHE*FS126, but this individual is not a proband.
No heterozygous carriers were reported in these studies.
positive_phenotypes: The biochemical tests indicated that two of the patients were homozygous for a silent variant and one was heterozygous for the atypical and a silent variant (AS).
Phenotypic information was not provided in these reports.
num_compound_or_double_hets: Probands 3 was explicitly described as compound heterozygous for BCHE*328D and BCHE*142M.
No compound or double heterozygotes were reported in these studies.
BCHE*FS126: deletion of two nucleotides (376–377) resulting in a shift in the translational reading frame and a truncated protein
BCHE*328D: nucleotide substitution at position 983 leading to an amino acid substitution of alanine by aspartate
